about_the_game:
As a Newcomer to Dewdrop Island, you're eager to seek down the Island Elder to ask for a Residency Permit to stay in this tropical paradise! But what's the big rush, when they're waaay up at the top of the mountain?

Go at your own pace, as you climb, glide, and backflip your way up a relaxing, island paradise, or get sidetracked by the zany requests of locals, and a range of wholesome activities!

It's fun to go off the beaten track, and who knows where it'll land you?

Key Features

  • Fish all the different fishies in the lakes, pools, and sea. Maybe you'll even catch some rare legendary variants...🐠

  • Take relaxing trips on the water trains around the islands and enjoy the scenic views🏝️

  • Challenge others to races across the islands, gliding through trees, & swimming across lakes to beat them to the finish line!

  • Print out charming photos with your trusty Instant Camera 📸

  • Help out fun charming locals like a sushi chef who wants to master the preparation of everything the waters have to offer!🍣

You've earned a break, so enjoy your time on Dewdrop Island!
